definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: draw off or out, withdraw, (NH id.; Aram. [[חֲלַץ]]; h.las. despoil, usu. Pa. etc.; Ph. n.pr. [[חלחבעל]] Baal has rescued, and [[חלץ]] alone; Ar. xalas.a withdraw, retire)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. Ho 5:6; [[וְחָֽלְחָה]] consec. De 25:9; [[חָֽלְחוּ]] La 4:3; Impf. 2 ms. [[תַּחֲלֽץ]]; Pt. pass. cstr. [[חֲלוּץ]] De 25:10; —
draw, draw off, c. acc. of sandal De 25:9, Is 20:2 (both sq. [[רֶגֶל]] c. [[מִן]]), cf. [[בֵּית חֲלוּץ הַנׇּ֑עַל]] De 25:10; draw out, present the breast, of animal giving suck La 4:3.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[חִלֵּץ]] Le 14:43 etc.; Impf. [[יְחַלֵּץ]] Job 36:15; [[וׇאֲחַלְּחָה]] Ps 7:5 (but on text vid. infr. ad fin.); sf. [[אֲחַלָּחְךָ]] Ps 50:15; [[אֲחַלְּחֶ֫ךָּ]] Ps 81:8, etc.; Imv. [[חַלְּחָה]] Ps 6:5; [[חַלְּחֵנִי]] Ps 119:153, Ps 140:2; —
pull out, tear out Le 14:40, Le 14:43 (P; stones fr. infested house).

rescue, deliver, c. obj. pers., but only poet.;—sq. [[נפשׁי]] Ps 6:5, Ps 116:8 ([[מִמָּ֫וֶת]]); cf. Ps 140:2 (sq. [[מִן]]); abs. c. acc. Ps 18:20 = 2Sa 22:20, Ps 34:8, Ps 50:15, Ps 81:8, Ps 91:15, Ps 119:153, Job 36:15; [[וׇאֲחַלְּחָה]] Ps 7:5; sq. acc., but I delivered AV Hup Ri, cf. Ew; and spoiled, despoiled Ges Hi De Bae (but this only in Aram.); < and oppressed (rd. [[וׇאֶֽלְחְחָה]]) Krochm Dy Gr Che ; (‖ [[גׇּמַלְתִּי רַע]]).
